Package hw03.gizzon.battleship

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw03.gizzon.battleship.Ship
  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    The Ship class will create instances of ships. Ship objects will contain the type of ship, which is dependent on their size, their starting x and y coordinate, the orientation and the color of their ship. The class is created to simplify the process of adding ships to the board.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Ship​(int size, int x, int y, java.lang.String o, java.awt.Color c)
      The Ship constructor is used to created an instance of the Ship class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship​(int size,
            int x,
            int y,
            java.lang.String o,
            java.awt.Color c)
        The Ship constructor is used to created an instance of the Ship class. The constructor will take all of the necessary parameter in order to create a ship.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the ship
        x - the starting x coordinate of the ship
        y - the starting y coordinate of the ship
        o - the orientation of the ship
        c - the color of the ship.
